summary: When Captain Nemo saves the passengers of a sinking ship and takes them to his Utopian underwater city he discovers that not all of his guests agree to remain there forever.

Moore|Anthony Bailey|Alan Barry|Vincent Harding|Hyma Beckley|Maxwell Craig|Margot Ley|Michael McGovern|Ralph Nossek|Jim O'Brady|Ann Patrice|Patsy Snell|Reg Thomason
